testcase.name: Test Sign up with correct Data
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on sign up page cd....................................passed Then enter new email to sign up cd..........................................passed Then User enter firstname and lastname to sign up cd........................passed Then user enter password and confirm password to sign up cd.................passed Then user enter captcha to sign up cd.......................................passed Then check checkbox to sign up cd...........................................passed Then user click on sign up button to sign up cd.............................passed Then user lands on pricing page and then user go to free ppts page cd.......passed Then user download a free product cd........................................passed Then user delete the new account created cd.................................passed

testcase.name: Test Sign up with Incorrect Data
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on sign up page.......................................passed Then user enter incorrect data in the sign sig up form......................passed Then form is error message is displayed and form is not submitted...........passed Then enter new email to sign up.............................................passed Then User enter firstname and lastname to sign up...........................passed Then user enter password and confirm password to sign up....................passed Then user enter captcha to sign up..........................................passed Then check checkbox to sign up..............................................passed Then user click on sign up button to sign up................................passed Then user is on pricing page................................................passed Then user go to free ppts page..............................................passed Then user download a free product...........................................passed Then user delete the new account created....................................passed
